https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/q2j7d0cG1oYqwdcwh0QzXwv2IiQ.jpg When a workaholic EVP inherits a manor and is expected to host a Christmas dinner for his family, he resorts to hiring an event planner, as he has no time or Christmas spirit. With her help, he will learn to love Christmas again. Deck the Heart
